title: Protecting your data inside the Home of the Future
description: Homes have always served to protect both the occupants and their valuables. Our Home of the Future is no exception, except it now needs to fortify itself both physically...and digitally. Join Grant Imahara as he investigates the best ways to secure your home and all of its valuable data.
